ygData.subject: Re: Wooden Shards
ygData.msgSnippet: Wooden Shards are loot from Treants
ygData.messageBody:
Wooden Shards are loot from Treants


Evan Hughes wrote:

> From: Evan Hughes <ebhughes@...>
>
> I was trying to complete a quest in Ogguk the other day and was exploring
> the different parts of the city (ya, I know their arn't many) and checking
> out the local merchants. Deep inside Ogguk their is an NPC called chief
> dooga (he's the one you get the HEHE meat off for a grobb quest) One of
> things he was selling was wooden shards, sort of sounds like a tinkering
> item... Any thoughts?
>
> Samtin - Level 14 enchanter on Tarew Marr
